Tartarus

AGDQ II

Published 14 Jan 2018

I am always very happy to be wrong, especially so this time. AGDQ 2018 turned out to be amazing, with a bunch of great runs and funny moments. Most amazingly of all though, over $2.25m was raised for charity throughout the week, a mind-blowing achievement for a bunch of nerds playing videogames as fast as possible.
